Scatter

Scatter is a local deals & advertising startup bringing offers near to you.

My task was to create a series of landing pages which deliver the message.

Logo, Responsive web design, and Front-end development
Technologies
Jekyll, Liquid, Ruby, HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, SASS, and Compass
